name: Sync orders from CS to ZD deals

parameters.content: In case an order contains multiple bikes

parameters.errorMessage: =Contact wit ID {{ $('CS Order Ref').item.json.customer_id }} could not be found in ZD

parameters.content:
## Question
Always search deal by contact and deal with multiple orders OR store CS order ID in ZD and risk duplicates due to already existing deals? Since that otherwise would require an initial matching.
## Suggestion
Always search for deal, HITL if decision unclear. Store CS ID as final mapping
